posts.post_content:
Interested in anything anyone might have relating to Nick Engel or any of his establishments in NYC during the 1880s-1890s....baseball schedules, trade cards, etc. 

PM or email, any info welcome.

email: semloh00 (at) yahoo.com

I recently consigned this to Goldin, I have not been able to find any other items online that came out his establishment

[url]https://goldin.co/item/1890-home-plate-hand-done-framed-cabinet-card-custom-collage-27-5x21-5ttd8p[/url]
